attributes.action: Abolish all payments for housing to MPs and provide accomodation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Government to purchase sufficient housing to accomodate each parliamentary seat.  Then to allocate each MP a residence for the duration of their term.  Pay for utilities, council tax etc but nothing else.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
